verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is my shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> I shall not want. <S%H2637><s%>
He makes me lie <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> in green <S%H1877><s%> pastures; <S%H9318><s%> He leads <S%H5095><s%> me beside <S%H5921><s%> quiet <S%H4496><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>
He restores <S%H7725><s%> my soul; <S%H5315><s%> He guides <S%H5148><s%> me in the paths <S%H4570><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> For His name's sake. <S%H4616><s%>

Even <S%H1571><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> I walk <S%H1980><s%> through the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death, <S%H6757><s%> I fear <S%H3372><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> evil; <S%H9563><s%> for Thou art with me; Thy rod <S%H7626><s%> and Thy staff, <S%H4938><s%> they comfort <S%H5162><s%> me.

Thou dost prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of my enemies; <S%H6887><s%> Thou hast anointed <S%H1878><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> with oil; <S%H8081><s%> My cup <S%H3563><s%> overflows. <S%H7310><s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> goodness <S%H9185><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will follow <S%H7291><s%> me all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life, <S%H9132><s%> And I will dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> forever. <S%H753><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
